content.value:
Santiago D.C Hostal is 2.5 km from Pan-American Park and 2.6 km from Saint Peter's Cathedral. Alfonso Bonilla Arag√≥n International Airport is 22 km away.Our guests are very happy with the location commenting that this part of Cali is their favorite, since the San Antonio neighborhood is multicultural and the location is central, having many tourist places within reach.

We have shared, private and family rooms for large and small groups of travelers.

-Taxes not included. 19% for Colombians.
-Breakfast included.
-Reception open 24/7.
-No curfew.
-Pet friendly.
-The maximum period of stay is of 14 days.

The hostel Santiago DC offers a comfortable, clean and safe space ideal for resting.
It has shared , private and family rooms, TV room, Netflix, reading room, games room, solarium, showers, relaxation patio, terrace, cafeteria , free WiFi, salsa classes, bachata, yoga, barbecue and breakfast include

description.description: The hostel Santiago DC offers a comfortable, clean and safe space ideal for resting. It has shared , private and family rooms, TV room, Netflix, reading room, games room, solarium, showers, relaxation patio, terrace, cafeteria , free WiFi, salsa classes, bachata, yoga, barbecue and breakfast included.
